    • Uses of LocalizedString in org.gatein.api.common

      Methods in org.gatein.api.common that return LocalizedString 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LocalizedString LocalizedDisplayable.getDisplayNames()
      Returns a localized string that can represent a single non localized name or many values each mapping to a specific Locale

    • Uses of LocalizedString in org.gatein.api.common.i18n

      Methods in org.gatein.api.common.i18n that return LocalizedString 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LocalizedString LocalizedString.setLocalizedValue(Locale locale, String value)
      This method will first remove the non localized value if one exists then sets the value for the specified locale.
      LocalizedString LocalizedString.setValue(String value)
      This will clear any localized values, and convert the string to a non localized string.
